snippet.title: 🏎️Race Condition (2022) PC Max Settings 60 Fps / Gameplay
snippet.description:
Race Condition is a fast paced arcade style racing game. You compete against eleven other cars in a frantic battle for the podium. 

Win medals to unlock new tracks around the globe. This game is all about the core racing experience and strives to put you into a zen-like state of flow as you speed around the tracks and become the first to cross the finish line.

Features:

Fast paced action
Fun gameplay
Intelligent AI-driven opponents
15 atmospheric tracks
Win medals to unlock new tracks
Various weather effects, such as rain and snow
Finely tuned game physics
Split-screen multiplayer
Support for both keyboard and controller

Why Are We Making This Game?

We have a lifelong love for racing games, reaching back to the fun times at the arcade in the 80's. 

Our ambition in making this game is to create the racing game we always wished we had, growing up. 

A game with emphasis on driving a fast race car with precise handling all whilst keeping it fun and exciting rather than technical and complicated. 

We hope you will like it as much as we do!

Become member, choose your perk: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzkgMTGuAB0BW9sfWOHY85A/join

Youtube Shorts channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/MrjeremyGamerZ59

Twiter: https://twitter.com/jeremy59300va

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@goldenggtt

If you got there, don't forget to like the video, after all, you clicked on "see more", you can use one more click .... (Thx ❤️️)

#new #racing #game
